question: What percentage of bookings are made by frequent flyers versus regular customers?
query:
SELECT 
    ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN a.frequent_flyer_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2) AS frequent_flyer_percentage,
    ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN a.frequent_flyer_id IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*), 2) AS regular_customer_percentage
FROM postgres_air.booking b
LEFT JOIN postgres_air.account a ON b.account_id = a.account_id;
